overview: A full busted suburban housewife (Jewell Marceau) has a secret desire for the beautiful young students in a college town. It all starts innocently when Jewell answers her door and discovers a busty young coed (Jodi Bean) earning some extra cash by selling door-to-door. Jewell eagerly invites her and compliments her on how well she is dressed and admires figure, barely able to restrain her building lust. She notices a run in Jodi's nylon and, since relaxation is the path to seduction, a foot rub quickly leads to much more serious girl-girl pleasures. Jewell understands and enjoys a slow, relaxed seduction as they make real love to each other all afternoon. In the end, the knock on the door leads to an afternoon of pleasure and many more sleepovers.Jewell even agrees to pay Jodi's way through college.
title: College Girl Seduction
